oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Ron Cornelius, Charlie Daniels, Sylvie Simmons - 2015-04-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Songs from a Room: the Nashville Works of Bob Dylan and Leonard Cohen. Discussion with Nashville musicians Ron Cornelius and Charlie Daniels and music journalist/author Sylvie Simmons from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 4, 2015. Presented in support of the exhibit Dylan, Cash, and the Nashville Cats: A New Music City.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ron Cornelius; Charlie Daniels; Sylvie Simmons;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Moderated by Michael Gray. Includes audio from video and selected recorded audio excerpts. Participants include guitarist Ron Cornelius who played and toured with Leonard Cohen including an appearance and the Isle of Wight festival in 1970, Charlie Daniels appeared on recordings with both Cohen and Bob Dylan. Sylvie Simmons wrote the biography I’m Your Man: The Life of Leonard Cohen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cornelius, Ron; Daniels, Charlie; Simmons, Sylvie; Dylan, Bob, 1941-; Cohen, Leonard, 1934-;
